name: Pong Game Replica v1.0
description:
Instructions:

Just press the fullscreen button otherwise you'll keep wondering what is going on.

Controls:

For Player 1 (the one on the left):

'W' key to move up and 'S' key to move down

For Player 2 (the one on the right):

'Up Arrow' key to move up and 'Down Arrow' key to move down
